title: Conference Call Bio Service

overview.purpose: The Conference Call Bio Service streamlines virtual meeting introductions by automatically sharing participant bios ahead of time.
overview.scope: Enables users to register, input and maintain a professional biography, and allows video conferencing platforms to retrieve bios using a secure API based on participants’ email addresses.

goals_objectives: Replace manual introductions in meetings with automated bio sharing
Support seamless integration with meeting platforms (Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams)
Ensure fast, secure, scalable API performance
Provide a simple and secure UI for user onboarding and bio management
Be the default bio-sharing platform for all major conferencing platforms

api_access.POST /api/bios/lookup: Accepts array of emails; returns links to public bio pages
api_access.GET /bio/{user_id}: Returns a public HTML or JSON representation of the user’s bio

user: Keep email private while allowing platform queries
platform: Send a list of email addresses and receive bio URLs

technical_requirements.stack: Any modern language; Docker and Docker Compose; PostgreSQL; Frontend: React/Vue/Svelte

open_questions: Should users have control over visibility (public/private bio)?
Should bios be time-bound (only shown for specific scheduled meetings)?
Will calendar integrations be necessary for automation?
